ryad.games.ergoengine
Class ScriptingSystem

java.lang.Object
  ryad.games.ergoengine.ScriptingSystem

public class ScriptingSystem
extends java.lang.Object

Allows us to load game script files and execute them as game code using the Mozilla Rhino JavaScript engine.

Author:
xealgo
